## CCSelectorProps.variant property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Defines which variant of the Autocomplete's TextField component is used. See [https://mui.com/material-ui/react-text-field/\#basic-textfield](https://mui.com/material-ui/react-text-field/#basic-textfield) about the TextField's variants.

**Signature:**

```typescript
variant?: TextFieldVariants;
```
